GoldTips: NL (Currently purchasing, cannot get new loans)
MerchantTips: No rush, no rush, take your time~
Paid off? There are still many good things~
Make good use of this money~
Your total assets might not be enough~
The things you carry are quite valuable~
The things you carry might not be very valuable~
MerchantSpeeches: @(Merchant tone)@ Might have owed money for too long~
@(Merchant tone)@ Isn't it time to repay~
